verses.t: And{G2532} after{G3326} these things{G5023} I saw{G1492} another{G32} angel{G2597} come down{G1537} from{G3588} heaven{G2192}, having{G1849} great{G2532} power{G3173}; and{G3588} the earth{G5461} was lightened{G1537} with{G3588} his{G846} glory{G846}.

And{G2532} he cried{G2896} mightily{G2479} with{G1722} a strong{G3173} voice{G5456}, saying{G3004}, Babylon{G897} the great{G3173} is fallen{G4098}, is fallen{G4098}, and{G2532} is become{G1096} the habitation{G2732} of devils{G1142}, and{G2532} the hold{G5438} of every{G3956} foul{G169} spirit{G4151}, and{G2532} a cage{G5438} of every{G3956} unclean{G169} and{G2532} hateful{G3404} bird{G3732}.

For{G3754} all{G3956} nations{G3588} have drunk{G4095} of{G1537} the wine{G3588} of the wrath{G3588} of her{G846} fornication{G3588}, and{G2532} the kings{G3588} of the earth{G3588} have committed fornication{G4203} with{G3326} her{G846}, and{G2532} the merchants{G3588} of the earth{G3588} are waxed rich{G4147} through{G1537} the abundance{G3588} of her{G846} delicacies{G3588}.

And{G2532} I heard{G191} another{G243} voice{G5456} from{G1537} heaven{G3588}, saying{G3004}, Come{G1831} out of{G1537} her{G846}, my{G3450} people{G3588}, that{G2443} ye be{G4790} not{G3361} partakers{G4790} of her{G846} sins{G3588}, and{G2532} that{G2443} ye receive{G2983} not{G3361} of{G1537} her{G846} plagues{G3588}.
For{G3754} her{G846} sins{G3588} have reached{G190} unto{G891} heaven{G3588}, and{G2532} God{G3588} hath remembered{G3421} her{G846} iniquities{G3588}.

Reward{G591} her{G846} even{G2532} as{G5613} she{G846} rewarded{G591} you{G5213}, and{G2532} double{G1363} unto her{G846} double{G1362} according to{G2596} her{G846} works{G3588}: in{G1722} the cup{G3588} which{G3739} she hath filled{G2767} fill{G2767} to her{G846} double{G1362}.NOTE! How much{G3745} she hath glorified{G1392} herself{G1438}, and{G2532} lived deliciously{G4763}, so much{G5118} torment{G929} and{G2532} sorrow{G3997} give{G1325} her{G846}: for{G3754} she saith{G3004} in{G1722} her{G846} heart{G3588}, I sit{G2521} a queen{G938}, and{G2532} am{G1510} no{G3756} widow{G5503}, and{G2532} shall see{G1492} no{G3756} sorrow{G3997}.

Therefore{G1223}shall{G2240} her{G846} plagues{G3588} come{G2240} in{G1722} one{G1520} day{G2250}, death{G2288}, and{G2532} mourning{G3997}, and{G2532} famine{G3042}; and{G2532} she shall be utterly burned{G2618} with{G1722} fire{G4442}: for{G3754} strong{G2478} is the Lord{G2962} God{G3588} who judgeth{G2919} her{G846}.

And{G2532} the kings{G3588} of the earth{G3588}, who{G3588} have committed fornication{G4203} and{G2532} lived deliciously{G4763} with{G3326} her{G846}, shall bewail{G2799} her{G846}, and{G2532} lament{G2875} for{G1909} her{G846}, when{G3752} they shall see{G991} the smoke{G3588} of her{G846} burning{G3588},

Standing{G2476} afar{G3113} off{G575} for{G1223} the fear{G3588} of her{G846} torment{G3588}, saying{G3004}, Alas{G3759}, alas{G3759}, that{G3588} great{G3173} city{G3588} Babylon{G897}, that mighty{G2478} city{G3588}! for{G3754} in{G1722} one{G1520} hour{G5610} is thy{G4675} judgment{G3588} come{G2064}.

And{G2532} the merchants{G3588} of the earth{G3588} shall weep{G2799} and{G2532} mourn{G3996} over{G1909} her{G846}; for{G3754} no man{G3762} buyeth{G59} their{G846} merchandise{G3588} any more{G3765}:

The merchandise{G1117} of gold{G5557}, and{G2532} silver{G696}, and{G2532} precious{G5093} stones{G3037}, and{G2532} of pearls{G3135}, and{G2532} fine linen{G1040}, and{G2532} purple{G4209}, and{G2532} silk{G4596}, and{G2532} scarlet{G2847}, and{G2532} all{G3956} thyine{G2367} wood{G3586}, and{G2532} all manner{G3956} vessels{G4632} of ivory{G1661}, and{G2532} all manner{G3956} vessels{G4632} of{G1537} most precious{G5093} wood{G3586}, and{G2532} of brass{G5475}, and{G2532} iron{G4604}, and{G2532} marble{G3139},

And{G2532} cinnamon{G2792}, and{G2532} odours{G2368}, and{G2532} ointments{G3464}, and{G2532} frankincense{G3030}, and{G2532} wine{G3631}, and{G2532} oil{G1637}, and{G2532} fine flour{G4585}, and{G2532} wheat{G4621}, and{G2532} beasts{G2934}, and{G2532} sheep{G4263}, and{G2532} horses{G2462}, and{G2532} chariots{G4480}, and{G2532} slaves{G4983}, and{G2532} souls{G5590} of men{G444}.

And{G2532} the fruits{G3703} that{G3588} thy{G4675} soul{G3588} lusted after{G3588} are departed{G565} from{G575} thee{G4675}, and{G2532} all things{G3956} which were dainty{G3045} and{G2532} goodly{G2986} are departed{G565} from{G575} thee{G4675}, and{G2532} thou shalt find{G2147} them{G846} no more{G3765} at all{G3361}.

The merchants{G3588} of these things{G5130}, which{G3588} were made rich{G4147} by{G575} her{G846}, shall stand{G2476} afar{G3113} off{G575} for{G1223} the fear{G3588} of her{G846} torment{G3588}, weeping{G2799} and{G2532} wailing{G3996},

And{G2532} saying{G3004}, Alas{G3759}, alas{G3759}, that great{G3173} city{G3588}, that was clothed{G4016} in fine linen{G1039}, and{G2532} purple{G4210}, and{G2532} scarlet{G2847}, and{G2532} decked{G5558} with{G1722} gold{G5557}, and{G2532} precious{G5093} stones{G3037}, and{G2532} pearls{G3135}!

For{G3754} in one{G1520} hour{G5610} so great{G5118} riches{G4149} is come to nought{G2049}. And{G2532}every{G3956} shipmaster{G2942}, and{G2532} all{G3956} the company{G3588} in{G1909} ships{G3588}, and{G2532} sailors{G3492}, and{G2532} as many as{G3745} trade by{G2038} sea{G3588}, stood{G2476} afar{G3113} off{G575},
And{G2532} cried{G2896} when they saw{G3708} the smoke{G3588} of her{G846} burning{G3588}, saying{G3004}, What{G5101} city is like unto{G3664} this great{G3173} city{G3588}!

And{G2532} they cast{G906} dust{G5522} on{G1909} their{G846} heads{G3588}, and{G2532} cried{G2896}, weeping{G2799} and{G2532} wailing{G3996}, saying{G3004}, Alas{G3759}, alas{G3759}, that{G3739} great{G3173} city{G3588}, wherein{G1722} were made rich{G4147} all{G3956} that had{G2192} ships{G4143} in{G1722} the sea{G3588} by reason of{G1537} her{G846} costliness{G3588}! for{G3754} in one{G1520} hour{G5610} is she made desolate{G2049}.

Rejoice{G2165} over{G1909} her{G846}, thou heaven{G3772}, and{G2532} ye holy{G40} apostles{G652} and{G2532} prophets{G3588}; for{G3754} God{G3588} hath{G2919} avenged{G3588} you{G5216} on{G1537} her{G846}.

And{G2532} a{G1520} mighty{G2478} angel{G32} took up{G142} a stone{G3037} like{G5613} a great{G3173} millstone{G3458}, and{G2532} cast{G906} it into{G1519} the sea{G3588}, saying{G3004}, Thus{G3779} with violence{G3731} shall{G906} that great{G3173} city{G4172} Babylon{G897} be thrown down{G906}, and{G2532} shall be found{G2147} no{G3756} more{G2089} at all{G3361}.

And{G2532} the voice{G5456} of harpers{G2790}, and{G2532} musicians{G3451}, and{G2532} of pipers{G834}, and{G2532} trumpeters{G4538}, shall be heard{G191} no{G3756} more{G2089} at all{G3361} in{G1722} thee{G4671}; and{G2532} no{G3956} craftsman{G5079}, of whatsoever{G3956} craft{G5078} he be, shall be found{G2147} any{G3756} more{G2089} in{G1722} thee{G4671}; and{G2532} the sound{G5456} of a millstone{G3458} shall be heard{G191} no{G3756} more{G2089} at all{G3361} in{G1722} thee{G4671};

And{G2532} the light{G5457} of a candle{G3088} shall shine{G5316} no{G3756} more{G2089} at all{G3361} in{G1722} thee{G4671}; and{G2532} the voice{G5456} of the bridegroom{G3566} and{G2532} of the bride{G3565} shall be heard{G191} no{G3756} more{G2089} at all{G3361} in{G1722} thee{G4671}: for{G3754} thy{G4675} merchants{G3588} were{G2258} the great men{G3588} of the earth{G3588}; for{G3754} by{G1722} thy{G4675} sorceries{G3588} were{G4105} all{G3956} nations{G3588} deceived{G4105}.
